Shruti Sharma (actress)

diff

2024-12-08T18:33:48Z
Line 24: Line 24:
Sharma made her [[Bollywood|Hindi]] film debut with [[Sanya Malhotra]]'s ''[[Pagglait]]'' in 2021. She played the role of Nazia Zaidi. It received mixed to positive reviews.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Ghosh |first1=Sayan |title='Pagglait' movie review: An insightful tale of repression and tragedy, taking pride in its simplicity |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/pagglait-movie-review-an-insightful-tale-of-repression-and-tragedy-taking-pride-in-its-simplicity/article34169701.ece |website=The Hindu |language=en-IN |date=26 March 2021}}</ref>
Sharma made her [[Bollywood|Hindi]] film debut with [[Sanya Malhotra]]'s ''[[Pagglait]]'' in 2021. She played the role of Nazia Zaidi. It received mixed to positive reviews.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Ghosh |first1=Sayan |title='Pagglait' movie review: An insightful tale of repression and tragedy, taking pride in its simplicity |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/pagglait-movie-review-an-insightful-tale-of-repression-and-tragedy-taking-pride-in-its-simplicity/article34169701.ece |website=The Hindu |language=en-IN |date=26 March 2021}}</ref>


In 2024, Sharma made her web debut with [[Sanjay Leela Bhansali]]'s ''[[Heeramandi]]'', playing Saima, a maid. [[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>
In 2024, Sharma made her web debut with [[Sanjay Leela Bhansali]]'s ''[[Heeramandi]]'', playing Saima, a maid. [[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref> In the same year earlier, Sharma made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an [[Cinema of United Arab Emirates|Emirati]] historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a woman named Tarannum who hails from [[Kozhikode|Calicut]] and she makes her appearance starting from the seventh episode onward. This was her first international web-series as well. However, all her scenes and dialogues in that web-series are in [[English]].

In the same year, Shruti made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an [[Cinema of United Arab Emirates|Emirati]] historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a woman named Tarannum who hails from [[Kozhikode|Calicut]] and she makes her appearance starting from the seventh episode onward. This was her first international web-series as well. However, all her scenes and dialogues in that web-series are in [[English]].

Line 26: Line 26:
In 2024, Sharma made her web debut with [[Sanjay Leela Bhansali]]'s ''[[Heeramandi]]'', playing Saima, a maid. [[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>
In 2024, Sharma made her web debut with [[Sanjay Leela Bhansali]]'s ''[[Heeramandi]]'', playing Saima, a maid. [[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>


In the same year, Shruti made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an Emirati historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a character named Tarannum in that series. This was her first international web-series. However all her scenes and dialogues in that series were in English.
In the same year, Shruti made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an [[Cinema of United Arab Emirates|Emirati]] historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a woman named Tarannum who hails from [[Kozhikode|Calicut]] and she makes her appearance starting from the seventh episode onward. This was her first international web-series as well. However, all her scenes and dialogues in that web-series are in [[English]].

In 2024, Sharma made her web debut with [[Sanjay Leela Bhansali]]'s ''[[Heeramandi]]'', playing Saima, a maid. [[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>
In 2024, Sharma made her web debut with [[Sanjay Leela Bhansali]]'s ''[[Heeramandi]]'', playing Saima, a maid. [[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>

In the same year, Shruti made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an Emirati historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a character named Tarannum in that series. This was her first international web-series.
In the same year, Shruti made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an Emirati historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a character named Tarannum in that series. This was her first international web-series. However all her scenes and dialogues in that series were in English.

[[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>

In the same year, Shruti made her [[Arabic]]-language debut in an Emirati historical drama web-series named ''Al-Boom'' ([[Arabic]] : ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸàŸÖ) which is based during the [[Second World War]] period. She plays a character named Tarannum in that series. This was her first international web-series.

[[Shubhra Gupta]] of ''[[The Indian Express]]'' termed her performance "spot on".<ref>{{cite news |last=Gupta |first=Shubhra |author-link=Shubhra Gupta |title=Heeramandi review: Part history, part myth, full-on Sanjay Leela Bhansali |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/heeramandi-review-part-history-part-myth-full-on-sanjay-leela-bhansali-9300636/ |access-date=2 May 2024 |work=[[The Indian Express]] |date=1 May 2024 |language=en}}</ref> [[Sukanya Verma]] noted, "Shruti Sharma's Saima fares a lot better than Alamzeb."<ref>{{Cite web|title=Heeramandi Review: Romance, Revenge, Rebellion|url=https://m.rediff.com/movies/review/heeramandi-review/20240501.htm|date=1 May 2024|website=Rediff |access-date=2 May 2024}}</ref>

Anveshi Jain

diff

2024-12-08T09:44:20Z
Line 27: Line 27:


===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight. Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandii Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series.<ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight. Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi performed in an [[item number]] song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúNaa Peru Seesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>

== Early and personal life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well. Before bagging a role in that series, she was told to get in shape. As a result she went on a strict diet and did rigourous exercise for 90 days. She even took up acting workshops as well. <ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain on being the Most Searched Woman on Google, Career Struggles and More| url=https://www.youtube.com/dFVrEe3AcOU?feature=shared |website=YouTube}}</ref> She mentioned that this was her one final attempt in this acting career and what she didn't forsee was the impact. <ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well. Before bagging a role in that series, she was told to get in shape. As a result she went on a strict diet and did rigourous exercise for 90 days. She even took up acting workshops as well. <ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain on being the Most Searched Woman on Google, Career Struggles and More| url=https://www.youtube.com/dFVrEe3AcOU?feature=shared |website=YouTube}}</ref> She mentioned that this was her one final attempt in this acting career and what she didn't forsee was the impact. She also mentioned that she played the role assuming that nobody would watch it since the series had bold sexual content and also requested the makers not to include her name in the credits.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Life from Artist's Eye - Anveshi Jain - TEDxGLAU | url=https://www.youtube.com/bFbX3eJbbcM?si=VoePg68093MbBZNI | website=YouTube}}</ref>


In 2022, she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree. However she said that she doesn't do erotic roles anymore. <ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2022, she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree. However she said that she doesn't do erotic roles anymore. <ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

== Career ==
== Career ==

Anveshi Jain

diff

2024-12-08T07:37:03Z
Line 25: Line 25:
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight. Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight. Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúNaa Peeru Seesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi performed in an [[item number]] song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúNaa Peru Seesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>

In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? 2024-12-08T07:33:56Z
Line 18: Line 18:
In 2022, she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree. However she said that she doesn't do erotic roles anymore. <ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2022, she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree. However she said that she doesn't do erotic roles anymore. <ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


She also started to take up other assignments. She hosts events and gives motivational talks. During her live sessions on social media, she talks to her fans about anxiety, self-esteem issues and loneliness. On some days, she simply reads to them from the [[Kamasutra]]. She was invited to speak at the [[TED Conference|TEDx Talk]] event as well.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Life from Artist's Eye - Anveshi Jain - TEDxGLAU | url=https://www.youtube.com/bFbX3eJbbcM?si=VoePg68093MbBZNI | website=YouTube}}</ref>

== Early and personal life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well. Before bagging a role in that series, she was told to get in shape. As a result she went on a strict diet and did rigourous exercise for 90 days.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain on being the Most Searched Woman on Google, Career Struggles and More| url=https://www.youtube.com/dFVrEe3AcOU?feature=shared |website=YouTube}}</ref> She mentioned that this was her one final attempt in this acting career and what she didn't forsee was the impact. <ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Before bagging a role in that series, she was told to get in shape. As a result she went on a strict diet and did rigourous exercise for 90 days. She even took up acting workshops as well. <ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain on being the Most Searched Woman on Google, Career Struggles and More| url=https://www.youtube.com/dFVrEe3AcOU?feature=shared |website=YouTube}}</ref> She mentioned that this was her one final attempt in this acting career and what she didn't forsee was the impact. <ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In 2022, she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. == Early and personal life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? ===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight. Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? ===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success.<ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season she played a [[bisexual ]] village woman named Neeta. This was her sole appearance in the entire web series. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> The lovemaking scene between her and [[Flora Saini]] went viral and she gained fame overnight.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />

===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success.<ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2019, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success.<ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>

Line 23: Line 23:


===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. She played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] in the first episide of second season. The second season was released on 7 January 2019. That episode marked her only appearance in that web series. The intimate lovemaking scene in that episode between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] became viral and she became an overnight success. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. In the first episode of second season, she played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is stuck in an unhappy marriage with her husband who's having an affair with a maid named Sajili ([[Flora Saini]]). The second season was released on 7 January 2019. That episode marked her only appearance in that web series. The intimate lovemaking scene in that episode between her and Saini became viral and she became an overnight success. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
