== Early and personal life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well.
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996<ref name=":0" /> to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry but found no success.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well. When she bagged a role in that web series and before she was finalized for it, she was told to get in shape. Hence, she went on a strict diet and did rigourous exercise for 90 days.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain on being the Most Searched Woman on Google, Career Struggles and More | url=https://www.youtube.com/dFVrEe3AcOU?feature=shared|website=YouTube}}</ref> In 2022, in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)|Vice]], she revealed that she thought this was her last attempt at getting a break in the industry and she did not know that she would get fame instantly.<ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In 2022, she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In that same interview she revealed hitting puberty early, leading to a significant increase in breast size. At 14, her father imposed restrictions, requiring her to wear extra layers and salwar-kameez to cover her chest. She frequently faced objectifying comments and looks.<ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained.<ref name=":2" /> She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship.<ref name=":2" /> She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it.<ref name=":2" /> She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

She also mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and she replies Khajuraho, she often receives sly looks as a reaction as people often correlate her adult content to the place which is famous for its [[Khajuraho Group of Monuments| temples depicting sexuality]].<ref name=":7">{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. She played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]]. This episode marked her only appearance in the web series. The intimate lovemaking scene in that episode between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] became viral and she became an overnight success. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success. She played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] in the first episide of second season. The second season was released on 7 January 2019. That episode marked her only appearance in that web series. The intimate lovemaking scene in that episode between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] became viral and she became an overnight success. <ref name=":52">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref> After that, she reportedly became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019.<ref name=":7" />


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? Anveshi Jain

diff

2024-12-07T11:25:52Z
Line 27: Line 27:


===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show named ''[[Gandii Baat]]'' which showcased stories of sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode of the second season of the show. She played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her shopkeeper husband Vaibhav (Aman Maheshwari) not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She finds out that he's having an affair with the housemaid named Sajili ([[Flora Saini]]) and Aman's brother Sagar (Rahul Jaittly) is in love with Sajili. Both the women fall in love with each other and later on discard their respective partners.
In 2019, she got her first show named ''[[Gandii Baat]]'' which showcased stories of sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode of the second season of the show. She played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her shopkeeper husband Vaibhav (Aman Maheshwari) not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. Vaibhav has an affair with a housemaid named Sajili ([[Flora Saini]]) and Aman's brother Sagar (Rahul Jaittly) is in love with Sajili. Sajili is in love with Neeta while simulataneously having an affair with Vaibhav. Neeta eventually wants to kill Sajili after finding out about their affair but the two women spontaneously make love. Both of them start having feelings towards one another and they also care for each other. Later on, they discard their respective partners and lead a happy life as a couple without caring what the village thought of them.


The second season was released in January 2019 and this was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The intimate making out scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> This was apparently the first Indian softcore lesbian scene in the web series shot explicitly and was released on an OTT platform in 2019, the year where OTT platforms were gaining prominence and thus was also one of the reasons she gained recognition for it.
The second season was released in January 2019 and this was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> This was apparently the first Indian softcore lesbian scene in the web series shot explicitly and was released on an OTT platform in 2019, the year where OTT platforms were gaining prominence and thus was also one of the reasons she gained recognition for it.


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? 2024-12-07T11:05:06Z
Line 27: Line 27:


===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode of the second season of the show. She plays a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her husband Vaibhav (Aman Maheshwari) not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She finds out that he's having an affair with another woman named Sajeeli ([[Flora Saini]]). However, Neeta's life takes a drastic turn when Sajeeli has a proposition for Vaibhav.
In 2019, she got her first show named ''[[Gandii Baat]]'' which showcased stories of sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode of the second season of the show. She played a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her shopkeeper husband Vaibhav (Aman Maheshwari) not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She finds out that he's having an affair with the housemaid named Sajili ([[Flora Saini]]) and Aman's brother Sagar (Rahul Jaittly) is in love with Sajili. Both the women fall in love with each other and later on discard their respective partners.


This was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> This was apparently the first Indian softcore lesbian scene in the web series shot explicitly and was released on an OTT platform in 2019, the year where OTT platforms were gaining prominence and thus was also one of the reasons she gained recognition for it.
The second season was released in January 2019 and this was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The intimate making out scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities towards the end of 2019. In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. She finds out that he's having an affair with another woman named Sajeeli ([[Flora Saini]]). However, Neeta's life takes a drastic turn when Sajeeli has a proposition for Vaibhav.
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode of the second season of the show. She plays a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her husband Vaibhav (Aman Maheshwari) not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She finds out that he's having an affair with another woman named Sajeeli ([[Flora Saini]]). However, Neeta's life takes a drastic turn when Sajeeli has a proposition for Vaibhav.


This was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. This was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref> This was apparently the first Indian softcore lesbian scene in the web series shot explicitly and was released on an OTT platform in 2019, the year where OTT platforms were gaining prominence and thus was also one of the reasons she gained recognition for it.


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus receiving surprised looks often.
She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus receiving sniggers often.


Before her role in Gandii Baat was finalized, she was told that there would be bold sexual scenes in it and that could affect her career and image. However she thought that nobody would watch the series and she went ahead with it.
Before her role in Gandii Baat was finalized, she was told that there would be bold sexual scenes in it and that could affect her career and image. However she thought that nobody would watch the series and she went ahead with it.


When her episode of Gandii Baat streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
When her lovemaking scene in that episode of Gandii Baat went viral right after it was released in January 2019, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence, she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

In 2018, she was chosen as the female lead for Telugu romantic drama ''[[Romantic (film)|Romantic]]'' starring alongside [[Akash Puri]]. The makers were looking for a fresh face alongside the male lead and they chose Bhardwaj because of her modelling career and her being comfortable in front of a camera.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/281118/delhi-girl-gayatri-bharadwaj-bags-a-role-in-tollywood.html |title=Delhi girl Gayatri Bharadwaj bags a role in Tollywood |date=27 November 2018 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref> Later, she was replaced with [[Ketika Sharma]].<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/reviews/romantic-movie-review-voyeuristic-drama/article37246993.ece |title='Romantic' movie review: Voyeuristic dram |newspaper=The Hindu |date=30 October 2021}}</ref>
In 2018, she was chosen as the female lead for Telugu romantic drama ''[[Romantic (film)|Romantic]]'' starring alongside [[Akash Puri]]. The makers were looking for a fresh face alongside the male lead and they chose Bhardwaj because of her modelling career and her being comfortable in front of a camera.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/281118/delhi-girl-gayatri-bharadwaj-bags-a-role-in-tollywood.html |title=Delhi girl Gayatri Bharadwaj bags a role in Tollywood |date=27 November 2018 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref> Later, she was replaced with [[Ketika Sharma]].<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/reviews/romantic-movie-review-voyeuristic-drama/article37246993.ece |title='Romantic' movie review: Voyeuristic dram |newspaper=The Hindu |date=30 October 2021}}</ref>


In 2021, Bharadwaj made her acting debut with ''[[Dhindora]]'' portraying Dr. Tara Rumpum opposite [[Bhuvan Bam]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://telanganatoday.com/gayatri-bhardwaj-makes-an-impressive-screen-debut-with-dhindora |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj makes impressive screen debut with 'Dhindora' |date=14 December 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/he-is-the-funniest-person-gayatri-bharadwaj-shares-her-experience-of-working-with-bhuvan-bam-in-dhindora |title='He is the funniest person': Gayatri Bharadwaj shares her experience of working with Bhuvan Bam in 'Dhindora'}}</ref> Her name in the web series is a word play on the film titled [[Tara Rum Pum]].
In 2021, Bharadwaj made her acting debut with ''[[Dhindora]]'' portraying Dr. Tara Rumpum opposite [[Bhuvan Bam]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://telanganatoday.com/gayatri-bhardwaj-makes-an-impressive-screen-debut-with-dhindora |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj makes impressive screen debut with 'Dhindora' |date=14 December 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/he-is-the-funniest-person-gayatri-bharadwaj-shares-her-experience-of-working-with-bhuvan-bam-in-dhindora |title='He is the funniest person': Gayatri Bharadwaj shares her experience of working with Bhuvan Bam in 'Dhindora'}}</ref> Her name in the web series is a word play on the 2007 Hindi film titled ''[[Ta Ra Rum Pum]]''.


In 2022, Bhardwaj also made her [[Bollywood|Hindi]] film debut with [[Laxman Utekar]]'s ''[[Ittu Si Baat]]'', which co-starred [[Bhupendra Jadawat]] and featured her as Sapna.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/interview/exclusive-gayatri-bhardwaj-in-times-when-love-is-so-accessible-ittu-si-baat-will-remind-viewers-of-shiddat-wala-pyaar/e6f3cc4500177 |title=Exclusive! Gayatri Bhardwaj: In times when love is so accessible, Ittu Si Baat will remind viewers of 'shiddat wala pyaar'}}</ref>

She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview she revealed that the director Vamsee had seen her performance in ''[[Dhindora]]'' and according to him right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview on 17 October, she revealed that the director Vamsee had seen her performance in ''[[Dhindora]]'' and according to him, right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.


In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named ''[[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]]'' which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film ''[[Teddy (film)|Teddy]]''. The film received mixed reviews.
In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named ''[[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]]'' which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film ''[[Teddy (film)|Teddy]]''. The film received mixed reviews.

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref> In 2021, she acted in a [[YouTube]] comedy web-series named ''[[Dhindora]]'' which marked her acting debut.
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref> In 2021, she acted in an Indian [[YouTube]] comedy web-series named ''[[Dhindora]]'' which marked her acting debut.

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref> In 2021, she acted in a [[YouTube]] comedy web-series named ''[[Dhindora]]'' which marked her acting debut.

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series. She has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>

==Early life==
==Early life==
Gayatri Bhardwaj was born on 17 June in Delhi, India.<ref>{{cite news |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/miss-india-united-continents-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-marks-her-birthday-by-distributing-food-masks-in-gurgaon/articleshow/76462040.cms |title=Miss India United Continents 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj marks her birthday by distributing food, masks in Gurgaon |newspaper=The Times of India |date=19 June 2020}}</ref> She began her modelling career with Campus Princess 2018.{{Citation needed|date=August 2023}} Later, she participated in [[Femina Miss India Delhi|Femina Miss India Delhi 2018]] and [[Femina Miss India 2018]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/introducing-fbb-colors-femina-miss-india-delhi-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj/videoshow/64302089.cms |title=Colors femina miss india delhi: Introducing FBB Colors Femina Miss India Delhi 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/lifestyle/fashion/femina-miss-india-2018-sub-contests-anukreethy-vas-5225406/ |title=Miss India 2018: Anukreethy Vas won Beauty with a Purpose, here are other sub-contest winners |date=20 June 2018}}</ref>
Gayatri Bhardwaj was born on 17 June 1995 in Delhi, India.<ref>{{cite news |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/gurgaon/miss-india-united-continents-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-marks-her-birthday-by-distributing-food-masks-in-gurgaon/articleshow/76462040.cms |title=Miss India United Continents 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj marks her birthday by distributing food, masks in Gurgaon |newspaper=The Times of India |date=19 June 2020}}</ref> She began her modelling career with Campus Princess 2018.{{Citation needed|date=August 2023}} Later, she participated in [[Femina Miss India Delhi|Femina Miss India Delhi 2018]] and [[Femina Miss India 2018]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/introducing-fbb-colors-femina-miss-india-delhi-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj/videoshow/64302089.cms |title=Colors femina miss india delhi: Introducing FBB Colors Femina Miss India Delhi 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/lifestyle/fashion/femina-miss-india-2018-sub-contests-anukreethy-vas-5225406/ |title=Miss India 2018: Anukreethy Vas won Beauty with a Purpose, here are other sub-contest winners |date=20 June 2018}}</ref>

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and [[Hindi cinema| Hindi films]]. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series. She has also worked in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi]] and [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] films. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>

'''''Dhindora''''' ({{translit|hi|iso|·∏åhi·πá·∏çhorƒÅ}}) is a 2021 Indian [[comedy drama|comedy-drama]] [[web series]] created by [[Bhuvan Bam]] and directed by Himank Gaur.<ref>{{Cite web |date=October 5, 2021 |first=Shweta |last=Keshri |title=Bhuvan Bam's Dhindora trailer out. Even SS Rajamouli is excited |url=https://www.indiatoday.in/binge-watch/story/bhuvan-bam-s-dhindora-trailer-out-even-ss-rajamouli-is-excited-1861122-2021-10-05 |access-date=2022-08-07 |website=India Today |language=en}}</ref> Based on the popular characters from Bam's ''BB Ki Vines'', the show features Bam playing [[dual role|ten different characters]],<ref name=":0">{{Cite web |date=2021-10-05 |title=Dhindora trailer: Bhuvan Bam plays nine characters in debut web series |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/dhindora-trailer-youtube-bb-ki-vines-bhuvan-bam-7553855/ |access-date=2022-08-07 |website=The Indian Express |language=en}}</ref> and also stars [[Gayatri Bhardwaj]] and Jeeveshu Ahluwalia.<ref>{{Citation |title=Dhindora Season 1 Review: Bhuvan Bam packs several punches in this social satire |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/web-series/reviews/hindi/dhindora/season-1/seasonreview/87181295.cms |access-date=2022-08-07}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |date=2021-12-19 |title=Bhuvan Bam: Despite Dhindora success, I wouldn‚Äôt want 2021 to exist in my life |website=Hindustan Times |language=en}}</ref> By July 2022, Bam claimed that the show had garnered over 500 million views.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-01-13 |title=Bhuvan Bam's Dhindora becomes YouTube India's most-watched show with 400m views |url=https://www.news9live.com/entertainment/ott/bhuvan-bams-web-series-dhindora-becomes-youtube-indias-mostwatched-show-146559 |access-date=2022-08-09 |website=News9Live |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-07-05 |title=Bhuvan Bam's 'Dhindora' 1st Indian Limited Series To Clock Half Billion Views On YouTube |url=https://www.outlookindia.com/art-entertainment/bhuvan-bam-s-dhindora-1st-indian-limited-series-to-clock-half-billion-views-on-youtube-news-206997 |access-date=2022-08-09 |website=outlookindia.com |language=en}}</ref> The soundtrack is composed by Bam and [[Sneha Khanwalkar]]. A second season is currently in production.<ref>{{cite web |date=June 17, 2022 |title=Bhuvan Bam confirms Season 2 of Dhindhora |url=https://www.tribuneindia.com/news/entertainment/bhuvan-bam-confirms-season-2-of-dhindhora-404617/ |website=The Tribune}}</ref>
'''''Dhindora''''' ({{translit|hi|iso|·∏åhi·πá·∏çhorƒÅ}})(translation: Drum roll) is a 2021 Indian [[comedy drama|comedy-drama]] [[web series]] created by [[Bhuvan Bam]] and directed by Himank Gaur.<ref>{{Cite web |date=October 5, 2021 |first=Shweta |last=Keshri |title=Bhuvan Bam's Dhindora trailer out. Even SS Rajamouli is excited |url=https://www.indiatoday.in/binge-watch/story/bhuvan-bam-s-dhindora-trailer-out-even-ss-rajamouli-is-excited-1861122-2021-10-05 |access-date=2022-08-07 |website=India Today |language=en}}</ref> Based on the popular characters from Bam's ''BB Ki Vines'', the show features Bam playing [[dual role|ten different characters]],<ref name=":0">{{Cite web |date=2021-10-05 |title=Dhindora trailer: Bhuvan Bam plays nine characters in debut web series |url=https://indianexpress.com/article/entertainment/web-series/dhindora-trailer-youtube-bb-ki-vines-bhuvan-bam-7553855/ |access-date=2022-08-07 |website=The Indian Express |language=en}}</ref> and also stars [[Gayatri Bhardwaj]] and Jeeveshu Ahluwalia.<ref>{{Citation |title=Dhindora Season 1 Review: Bhuvan Bam packs several punches in this social satire |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/web-series/reviews/hindi/dhindora/season-1/seasonreview/87181295.cms |access-date=2022-08-07}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |date=2021-12-19 |title=Bhuvan Bam: Despite Dhindora success, I wouldn‚Äôt want 2021 to exist in my life |url=https://www.hindustantimes.com/entertainment/web-series/bhuvan-bam-despite-dhindora-success-i-wouldn-t-want-2021-to-exist-in-my-life-101639919303548.html |access-date=2022-08-07 |website=Hindustan Times |language=en}}</ref> By July 2022, Bam claimed that the show had garnered over 500 million views.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-01-13 |title=Bhuvan Bam's Dhindora becomes YouTube India's most-watched show with 400m views |url=https://www.news9live.com/entertainment/ott/bhuvan-bams-web-series-dhindora-becomes-youtube-indias-mostwatched-show-146559 |access-date=2022-08-09 |website=News9Live |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-07-05 |title=Bhuvan Bam's 'Dhindora' 1st Indian Limited Series To Clock Half Billion Views On YouTube |url=https://www.outlookindia.com/art-entertainment/bhuvan-bam-s-dhindora-1st-indian-limited-series-to-clock-half-billion-views-on-youtube-news-206997 |access-date=2022-08-09 |website=outlookindia.com |language=en}}</ref> The soundtrack is composed by Bam and [[Sneha Khanwalkar]]. A second season is currently in production.<ref>{{cite web |date=June 17, 2022 |title=Bhuvan Bam confirms Season 2 of Dhindhora |url=https://www.tribuneindia.com/news/entertainment/bhuvan-bam-confirms-season-2-of-dhindhora-404617/ |website=The Tribune}}</ref>

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and [[Hindi cinema| Hindi films]]. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>She has also acted in a couple of [[Telugu cinema|Telugu films]].
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and [[Hindi cinema| Hindi films]]. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>


==Early life==
==Early life==

Gayatri Bhardwaj

diff

2024-12-06T16:56:09Z
Line 36: Line 36:
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview she revealed that the director Vamsee had seen her performance in ''[[Dhindora]]'' and according to him right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview she revealed that the director Vamsee had seen her performance in ''[[Dhindora]]'' and according to him right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.


In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named ''[[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]]'' which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film ''[[Teddy]]''. The film received mixed reviews.
In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named ''[[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]]'' which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film ''[[Teddy (film)|Teddy]]''. The film received mixed reviews.

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi films]] and web-series. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in Hindi web-series and [[Hindi cinema| Hindi films]]. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>She has also acted in a couple of [[Telugu cinema|Telugu films]].

==Early life==

Gayatri Bhardwaj

diff

2024-12-06T16:50:11Z
Line 28: Line 28:
In 2018, she was chosen as the female lead for Telugu romantic drama ''[[Romantic (film)|Romantic]]'' starring alongside [[Akash Puri]]. The makers were looking for a fresh face alongside the male lead and they chose Bhardwaj because of her modelling career and her being comfortable in front of a camera.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/281118/delhi-girl-gayatri-bharadwaj-bags-a-role-in-tollywood.html |title=Delhi girl Gayatri Bharadwaj bags a role in Tollywood |date=27 November 2018 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref> Later, she was replaced with [[Ketika Sharma]].<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/reviews/romantic-movie-review-voyeuristic-drama/article37246993.ece |title='Romantic' movie review: Voyeuristic dram |newspaper=The Hindu |date=30 October 2021}}</ref>
In 2018, she was chosen as the female lead for Telugu romantic drama ''[[Romantic (film)|Romantic]]'' starring alongside [[Akash Puri]]. The makers were looking for a fresh face alongside the male lead and they chose Bhardwaj because of her modelling career and her being comfortable in front of a camera.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/281118/delhi-girl-gayatri-bharadwaj-bags-a-role-in-tollywood.html |title=Delhi girl Gayatri Bharadwaj bags a role in Tollywood |date=27 November 2018 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref> Later, she was replaced with [[Ketika Sharma]].<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/reviews/romantic-movie-review-voyeuristic-drama/article37246993.ece |title='Romantic' movie review: Voyeuristic dram |newspaper=The Hindu |date=30 October 2021}}</ref>


In 2021, Bharadwaj made her acting debut with ''[[Dhindora]]'' portraying Dr. Tara Rumpum opposite [[Bhuvan Bam]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://telanganatoday.com/gayatri-bhardwaj-makes-an-impressive-screen-debut-with-dhindora |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj makes impressive screen debut with 'Dhindora' |date=14 December 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/he-is-the-funniest-person-gayatri-bharadwaj-shares-her-experience-of-working-with-bhuvan-bam-in-dhindora |title='He is the funniest person': Gayatri Bharadwaj shares her experience of working with Bhuvan Bam in 'Dhindora'}}</ref>
In 2021, Bharadwaj made her acting debut with ''[[Dhindora]]'' portraying Dr. Tara Rumpum opposite [[Bhuvan Bam]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://telanganatoday.com/gayatri-bhardwaj-makes-an-impressive-screen-debut-with-dhindora |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj makes impressive screen debut with 'Dhindora' |date=14 December 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/he-is-the-funniest-person-gayatri-bharadwaj-shares-her-experience-of-working-with-bhuvan-bam-in-dhindora |title='He is the funniest person': Gayatri Bharadwaj shares her experience of working with Bhuvan Bam in 'Dhindora'}}</ref> Her name in the web series is a word play on the film titled [[Tara Rum Pum]].


In 2022, Bhardwaj also made her [[Bollywood|Hindi]] film debut with [[Laxman Utekar]]'s ''[[Ittu Si Baat]]'', which co-starred [[Bhupendra Jadawat]] and featured her as Sapna.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/interview/exclusive-gayatri-bhardwaj-in-times-when-love-is-so-accessible-ittu-si-baat-will-remind-viewers-of-shiddat-wala-pyaar/e6f3cc4500177 |title=Exclusive! Gayatri Bhardwaj: In times when love is so accessible, Ittu Si Baat will remind viewers of 'shiddat wala pyaar'}}</ref>
In 2022, Bhardwaj also made her [[Bollywood|Hindi]] film debut with [[Laxman Utekar]]'s ''[[Ittu Si Baat]]'', which co-starred [[Bhupendra Jadawat]] and featured her as Sapna.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/interview/exclusive-gayatri-bhardwaj-in-times-when-love-is-so-accessible-ittu-si-baat-will-remind-viewers-of-shiddat-wala-pyaar/e6f3cc4500177 |title=Exclusive! Gayatri Bhardwaj: In times when love is so accessible, Ittu Si Baat will remind viewers of 'shiddat wala pyaar'}}</ref>
Line 34: Line 34:
Bhardwaj next paired opposite [[Ritvik Sahore]] in ''Ishq Express'' as Tanya and in ''[[Highway Love]]'' as Inaya.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/gayatrii-bhhardwaj-ritvik-sahore-share-their-experience-of-working-on-ishq-express |title=Gayatrii Bhhardwaj, Ritvik Sahore share their experience of working on 'Ishq Express'}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/news/gayatri-bhardwaj-walks-down-the-memory-lane-with-highway-love/536d9b898b915 |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj walks down the memory lane with Highway Love}}</ref>
Bhardwaj next paired opposite [[Ritvik Sahore]] in ''Ishq Express'' as Tanya and in ''[[Highway Love]]'' as Inaya.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/gayatrii-bhhardwaj-ritvik-sahore-share-their-experience-of-working-on-ishq-express |title=Gayatrii Bhhardwaj, Ritvik Sahore share their experience of working on 'Ishq Express'}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/news/gayatri-bhardwaj-walks-down-the-memory-lane-with-highway-love/536d9b898b915 |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj walks down the memory lane with Highway Love}}</ref>


She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview she revealed that the director [[Vamsee]] had seen her performance in [[Dhindora]] and according to him right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview she revealed that the director Vamsee had seen her performance in ''[[Dhindora]]'' and according to him right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.


In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]] which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film [[Teddy]]. The film received mixed reviews.
In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named ''[[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]]'' which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film ''[[Teddy]]''. The film received mixed reviews.

She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut. She played the role of Mani who is Tiger's wife.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> In an interview she revealed that the director [[Vamsee]] had seen her performance in [[Dhindora]] and according to him right from when he saw her first scene in the series, she matched the description of Mani's image he had in mind and after he met her to discuss about her role in the film, she was selected for it. The film released on 20 October 2023 and it was a box-office success but received mixed reviews.


In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]] which was released on 2 August 2024. The film received mixed reviews.
In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]] which was released on 2 August 2024. It was a remake of a Tamil film [[Teddy]]. The film received mixed reviews.

Singham Again
