2024-12-06T13:51:32Z
Line 42: Line 42:
[[Deputy commissioner|DCP]] Bajirao Singham, is now married to Avni Kamat, who works in the Cultural Ministry, and has a son, Shaurya. He is transferred from [[Mumbai]] to [[Srinagar]] for three years. Once there, he is attacked by the Chief of Lashkar, Omar Hafeez, who had fled from [[Pakistan]] to [[Sri Lanka]] and started selling [[drugs]] after his sons, Riyaaz and Raza's plans were thwarted.{{Efn|name=Timeline| As shown in ''[[Sooryavanshi]]'' (2021)}} Singham successfully arrests him, but Omar arrogantly threatens him about the danger coming towards him, [[Simmba|Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao]], and [[Sooryavanshi|Veer Sooryavanshi]] for killing his sons. Singham meets Home Minister Raj Jaishankar and tells him about the drug syndicate operating in India and how they are being transported from [[Sri Lanka]] to the coastal areas of [[Tamil Nadu]]. Using the profits from the drug trade, Omar wants to initiate another terrorist attack on India. Jaishankar commissions a new squad,'' Shiva Squad'', led by Singham and his fellow officers, ACP Daya and ACP Devika, to stop and destroy Lashkar.
[[Deputy commissioner|DCP]] Bajirao Singham, is now married to Avni Kamat, who works in the Cultural Ministry, and has a son, Shaurya. He is transferred from [[Mumbai]] to [[Srinagar]] for three years. Once there, he is attacked by the Chief of Lashkar, Omar Hafeez, who had fled from [[Pakistan]] to [[Sri Lanka]] and started selling [[drugs]] after his sons, Riyaaz and Raza's plans were thwarted.{{Efn|name=Timeline| As shown in ''[[Sooryavanshi]]'' (2021)}} Singham successfully arrests him, but Omar arrogantly threatens him about the danger coming towards him, [[Simmba|Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao]], and [[Sooryavanshi|Veer Sooryavanshi]] for killing his sons. Singham meets Home Minister Raj Jaishankar and tells him about the drug syndicate operating in India and how they are being transported from [[Sri Lanka]] to the coastal areas of [[Tamil Nadu]]. Using the profits from the drug trade, Omar wants to initiate another terrorist attack on India. Jaishankar commissions a new squad,'' Shiva Squad'', led by Singham and his fellow officers, ACP Daya and ACP Devika, to stop and destroy Lashkar.


Two years later, Avni is hosting a theatre production of ''[[Ramlila]]'', depicting the journey of [[Lord Ram]] and [[Sita]]. Singham catches a ship sailing towards Tamil Nadu from Sri Lanka and finds [[contraband|drugs]] in the containers and arrests four men working for Danger Lanka. Upon interrogating them, the arrested men reveal that three of Lanka's associates were residing in [[Madurai]]. Singham calls upon DCP Shakti Shetty from Madurai to arrest and escort all three of them to [[Mumbai]], which she does promptly. However, on the same night, Danger Lanka arrives at the police station, kills all the policemen, and rescues his three men. Shakti feels guilty for not being able to save the police officers, but Singham consoles and tells her to track them down.
Two years later, Avni is hosting a theatre production of ''[[Ramlila]]'', depicting the journey of [[Lord Ram]] and [[Sita]]. Singham catches a ship sailing towards Tamil Nadu from Sri Lanka and finds [[contraband|drugs]] in the containers and arrests four men working for a person named Danger Lanka. Upon interrogating them, the arrested men reveal that three of Lanka's associates were residing in [[Madurai]]. Singham calls upon DCP Shakti Shetty from Madurai to arrest and escort all three of them to [[Mumbai]], which she does promptly. However, on the same night, Danger Lanka arrives at the police station, kills all the policemen, and rescues his three men. Shakti feels guilty for not being able to save the police officers, but Singham consoles and tells her to track them down.


Meanwhile, Avni departs for [[Rameshwaram]] to shoot some footage for the production along with her colleague, Mrigya. Singham sends Daya along with them. Upon collecting footage for the production, Avni is about to go back to Mumbai when she is abducted by Danger Lanka. He reveals that it was a plan made by him and Mrigya. On hearing of Avni's abduction, Singham and his team leave for Rameshwaram. Meanwhile, Daya tails and finds Avni, rescues and helps her to run away. However, she is chased by Lanka's men and in the ensuing chase, throws her bangles, which were gifted by Singham, as a mark for him to trace. While trying to save Avni, Daya gets brutally injured by Lanka. Avni is then rescued by ACP Satya Bali, who considers Singham his inspiration and takes her to his home. Singham reaches there and meets Daya, who is in a critical state and airlifts him. He finds Avni's bangles and finds out that she is with Satya.
Meanwhile, Avni departs for [[Rameshwaram]] to shoot some footage for the production along with her colleague, Mrigya. Singham sends Daya along with them. Upon collecting footage for the production, Avni is about to go back to Mumbai when she is abducted by Danger Lanka. He reveals that it was a plan made by him and Mrigya. On hearing of Avni's abduction, Singham and his team leave for Rameshwaram. Meanwhile, Daya tails and finds Avni, rescues and helps her to run away. However, she is chased by Lanka's men and in the ensuing chase, throws her bangles, which were gifted by Singham, as a mark for him to trace. While trying to save Avni, Daya gets brutally injured by Lanka. Avni is then rescued by ACP Satya Bali, who considers Singham his inspiration and takes her to his home. Singham reaches there and meets Daya, who is in a critical state and airlifts him. He finds Avni's bangles and finds out that she is with Satya.

Singham Again

2024-12-06T13:50:27Z
Line 40: Line 40:


== Plot ==
== Plot ==
[[Deputy commissioner|DCP]] Bajirao Singham, is now married to Avni Kamat, who works in the Cultural Ministry, and has a son, Shaurya. He is transferred from [[Mumbai]] to [[Srinagar]] for three years. Once there, he is attacked by the Chief of Lashkar, Omar Hafeez, who had fled from [[Pakistan]] to [[Sri Lanka]] and started selling [[drugs]] after his sons, Riyaaz and Raza's plans were thwarted.{{Efn|name=Timeline| shown in ''[[Sooryavanshi]]'' (2021)}} Singham successfully arrests him, but Omar arrogantly threatens him about the danger coming towards him, [[Simmba|Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao]], and [[Sooryavanshi|Veer Sooryavanshi]] for killing his sons. Singham meets Home Minister Raj Jaishankar and tells him about the drug syndicate operating in India and how they are being transported from [[Sri Lanka]] to the coastal areas of [[Tamil Nadu]]. Using the profits from the drug trade, Omar wants to initiate another terrorist attack on India. Jaishankar commissions a new squad,'' Shiva Squad'', led by Singham and his fellow officers, ACP Daya and ACP Devika, to stop and destroy Lashkar.
[[Deputy commissioner|DCP]] Bajirao Singham, is now married to Avni Kamat, who works in the Cultural Ministry, and has a son, Shaurya. He is transferred from [[Mumbai]] to [[Srinagar]] for three years. Once there, he is attacked by the Chief of Lashkar, Omar Hafeez, who had fled from [[Pakistan]] to [[Sri Lanka]] and started selling [[drugs]] after his sons, Riyaaz and Raza's plans were thwarted.{{Efn|name=Timeline| As shown in ''[[Sooryavanshi]]'' (2021)}} Singham successfully arrests him, but Omar arrogantly threatens him about the danger coming towards him, [[Simmba|Sangram "Simmba" Bhalerao]], and [[Sooryavanshi|Veer Sooryavanshi]] for killing his sons. Singham meets Home Minister Raj Jaishankar and tells him about the drug syndicate operating in India and how they are being transported from [[Sri Lanka]] to the coastal areas of [[Tamil Nadu]]. Using the profits from the drug trade, Omar wants to initiate another terrorist attack on India. Jaishankar commissions a new squad,'' Shiva Squad'', led by Singham and his fellow officers, ACP Daya and ACP Devika, to stop and destroy Lashkar.


Two years later, Avni is hosting a theatre production of ''[[Ramlila]]'', depicting the journey of [[Lord Ram]] and [[Sita]]. Singham catches a ship sailing towards Tamil Nadu from Sri Lanka and finds [[contraband|drugs]] in the containers and arrests four men working for Danger Lanka. Upon interrogating them, the arrested men reveal that three of Lanka's associates were residing in [[Madurai]]. Singham calls upon DCP Shakti Shetty from Madurai to arrest and escort all three of them to [[Mumbai]], which she does promptly. However, on the same night, Danger Lanka arrives at the police station, kills all the policemen, and rescues his three men. Shakti feels guilty for not being able to save the police officers, but Singham consoles and tells her to track them down.
Two years later, Avni is hosting a theatre production of ''[[Ramlila]]'', depicting the journey of [[Lord Ram]] and [[Sita]]. Singham catches a ship sailing towards Tamil Nadu from Sri Lanka and finds [[contraband|drugs]] in the containers and arrests four men working for Danger Lanka. Upon interrogating them, the arrested men reveal that three of Lanka's associates were residing in [[Madurai]]. Singham calls upon DCP Shakti Shetty from Madurai to arrest and escort all three of them to [[Mumbai]], which she does promptly. However, on the same night, Danger Lanka arrives at the police station, kills all the policemen, and rescues his three men. Shakti feels guilty for not being able to save the police officers, but Singham consoles and tells her to track them down.

Gayatri Bhardwaj

'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi films]]. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>
'''Gayatri Bhardwaj''' (born 17 June 1995) is an Indian model, actress and beauty pageant title holder who predominantly works in [[Hindi cinema|Hindi films]] and web-series. She represented the state of [[New Delhi]] at the [[Femina Miss India 2018]] pageant, where was crowned [[Femina Miss India|Femina Miss India Miss United Continents 2018]] and represented India at [[Miss United Continents]] pageant.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/videos/beauty-pageants/miss-india/gayatri-bhardwaj-i-feel-honoured-to-represent-delhi/videoshow/63861657.cms |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj: I feel honoured to represent Delhi &#124; Beauty Pageants - Times of India Videos |website=[[The Times of India]]}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.timesnownews.com/videos/zoom/bollywood-news/miss-united-continents-india-2018-gayatri-bhardwaj-talks-about-her-bollywood-plans-bollywood-news/9022 |title=Miss United Continents India 2018 Gayatri Bhardwaj Talks About Her Bollywood Plans! &#124; Bollywood News}}</ref>

She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> The film released on 20 October 2023.
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> The film released on 20 October 2023.


In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]] which received mixed reviews.
In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]] which was released on 2 August 2024. The film received mixed reviews.

Line 26: Line 26:


==Career==
==Career==
In 2018, she was chosen as the female lead for Telugu romantic drama ''[[Romantic (film)|Romantic]]'' starring alongside [[Akash Puri]].<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/281118/delhi-girl-gayatri-bharadwaj-bags-a-role-in-tollywood.html |title=Delhi girl Gayatri Bharadwaj bags a role in Tollywood |date=27 November 2018 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref> Later, she was replaced with [[Ketika Sharma]].<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/reviews/romantic-movie-review-voyeuristic-drama/article37246993.ece |title='Romantic' movie review: Voyeuristic dram |newspaper=The Hindu |date=30 October 2021}}</ref>
In 2018, she was chosen as the female lead for Telugu romantic drama ''[[Romantic (film)|Romantic]]'' starring alongside [[Akash Puri]]. The makers were looking for a fresh face alongside the male lead and they chose Bhardwaj because of her modelling career and her being comfortable in front of a camera.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/281118/delhi-girl-gayatri-bharadwaj-bags-a-role-in-tollywood.html |title=Delhi girl Gayatri Bharadwaj bags a role in Tollywood |date=27 November 2018 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref> Later, she was replaced with [[Ketika Sharma]].<ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/reviews/romantic-movie-review-voyeuristic-drama/article37246993.ece |title='Romantic' movie review: Voyeuristic dram |newspaper=The Hindu |date=30 October 2021}}</ref>


In 2021, Bharadwaj made her acting debut with ''[[Dhindora]]'' portraying Dr. Tara Rumpum opposite [[Bhuvan Bam]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://telanganatoday.com/gayatri-bhardwaj-makes-an-impressive-screen-debut-with-dhindora |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj makes impressive screen debut with 'Dhindora' |date=14 December 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/he-is-the-funniest-person-gayatri-bharadwaj-shares-her-experience-of-working-with-bhuvan-bam-in-dhindora |title='He is the funniest person': Gayatri Bharadwaj shares her experience of working with Bhuvan Bam in 'Dhindora'}}</ref>
In 2021, Bharadwaj made her acting debut with ''[[Dhindora]]'' portraying Dr. Tara Rumpum opposite [[Bhuvan Bam]].<ref>{{cite web |url=https://telanganatoday.com/gayatri-bhardwaj-makes-an-impressive-screen-debut-with-dhindora |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj makes impressive screen debut with 'Dhindora' |date=14 December 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/he-is-the-funniest-person-gayatri-bharadwaj-shares-her-experience-of-working-with-bhuvan-bam-in-dhindora |title='He is the funniest person': Gayatri Bharadwaj shares her experience of working with Bhuvan Bam in 'Dhindora'}}</ref>
Line 36: Line 36:
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> The film released on 20 October 2023.
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> The film released on 20 October 2023.


In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy]].
In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy (2024 film)|Buddy]] which received mixed reviews.

Bhardwaj next paired opposite [[Ritvik Sahore]] in ''Ishq Express'' as Tanya and in ''[[Highway Love]]'' as Inaya.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/gayatrii-bhhardwaj-ritvik-sahore-share-their-experience-of-working-on-ishq-express |title=Gayatrii Bhhardwaj, Ritvik Sahore share their experience of working on 'Ishq Express'}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/news/gayatri-bhardwaj-walks-down-the-memory-lane-with-highway-love/536d9b898b915 |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj walks down the memory lane with Highway Love}}</ref>
Bhardwaj next paired opposite [[Ritvik Sahore]] in ''Ishq Express'' as Tanya and in ''[[Highway Love]]'' as Inaya.<ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.freepressjournal.in/entertainment/gayatrii-bhhardwaj-ritvik-sahore-share-their-experience-of-working-on-ishq-express |title=Gayatrii Bhhardwaj, Ritvik Sahore share their experience of working on 'Ishq Express'}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://www.ottplay.com/news/gayatri-bhardwaj-walks-down-the-memory-lane-with-highway-love/536d9b898b915 |title=Gayatri Bhardwaj walks down the memory lane with Highway Love}}</ref>


She is slated to appear in Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]].<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref>
She appeared in the Telugu film ''[[Tiger Nageswara Rao]]'' opposite [[Ravi Teja]] and [[Nupur Sanon (actress)|Nupur Sanon]] thereby making her [[Tollywood]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/tollywood/130823/will-tiger-nageswara-rao-revive-ravi-career.html |title=Ravi Teja Pins Hopes on Real-life Story |date=13 August 2023 |website=Deccan Chronicle}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |url=https://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/ravi-tejas-tiger-nageswara-rao-to-release-on-october-20/article66674655.ece |title=Ravi Teja's 'Tiger Nageswara Rao' to release on October 20 |newspaper=The Hindu |date=29 March 2023}}</ref> The film released on 20 October 2023.

In 2024, she acted in another Telugu film named [[Buddy]].

In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.
She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus receiving surprised looks often.


When her episode of [[Gandii Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
Before her role in Gandii Baat was finalized, she was told that there would be bold sexual scenes in it and that could affect her career and image. However she thought that nobody would watch the series and she went ahead with it.
When her episode of Gandii Baat streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She had to take a break from her relationship with her boyfriend as the role had taken a toll on her romantic relationship. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


== Career ==
== Career ==

Anveshi Jain

diff

2024-12-06T08:01:21Z
Line 25: Line 25:


===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her husband not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She comes in conflict with a woman ([[Flora Saini]]) he's having an affair with. This was her sole appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode of the second season of the show. She plays a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her husband Vaibhav (Aman Maheshwari) not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She finds out that he's having an affair with another woman named Sajeeli ([[Flora Saini]]). However, Neeta's life takes a drastic turn when Sajeeli has a proposition for Vaibhav.
This was Anveshi's only appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? ===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a man's wife who's [[bisexual]] and that was her sole appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate scenes between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a village woman named Neeta who's [[bisexual]] and is in a troubled marriage due to her husband not being able to satisfy her sexually and emotionally. She comes in conflict with a woman ([[Flora Saini]]) he's having an affair with. This was her sole appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and Saini in that episode led to Anveshi (who was just 22 years of age at that time) become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? == Early and personal life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born to a Jain family in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well.
Anveshi was born on 25th June 1996 to a Jain family, in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in [[Indore]].<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]], she worked as a singer and emcee as well.


In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.
She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.


When her episode of [[Gandii Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.
When her episode of [[Gandii Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

She also mentioned that an attempt to get a role in that series was her last attempt to get inside the industry.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

Anveshi was born to a Jain family in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in Indore.<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandii Baat]] she worked as a singer and emcee as well.


In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.
In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.
She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.


When her episode of [[Gandii Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.
When her episode of [[Gandii Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.

She also mentioned that an attempt to get a role in that series was her last attempt to get inside the industry.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>

She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.


When her episode of [[Gandi Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.
When her episode of [[Gandii Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.

== Early and personal life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born to a Jain family in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in Indore.<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]].<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandhi Baat]] she worked as a singer and emcee as well. She gave several auditions in order to get a break in the film industry.
Anveshi was born to a Jain family in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in Indore.<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]] and gave several auditions over there to get a break into the film industry.<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandhi Baat]] she worked as a singer and emcee as well.


In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. As a result she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.
In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. She often had to wear salwaar-kameez instead of other dresses which would cover up her chest region. As a result of her large chest, she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.


She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and giving her a surprised look.
She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and thus giving her a surprised look.

When her episode of [[Gandi Baat]] streamed in 2019 and after it went viral, her relations with her family and loved ones were strained. She struggled to get rid of her erotic image but according to her therapy taught her to accept it rather than struggling to fight it. She mentioned that she embraced that image and started to use it for her benefit. Hence she started sharing videos where she wore cleavage-baring blouses, short dresses or saree.

'''Anveshi Jain''' (born 25 June 1996)<ref>{{Cite web |title=Instagram |url=https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pIefxoJ9K/?igsh=MWc2YnQ1aWJqZnFvdA== |access-date=2024-10-01 |website=www.instagram.com}}</ref> is an Indian [[actress]], [[social media influencer]], [[Singing|singer]], and TEDx speaker. She gained recognition after her debut web series in 2019, ''[[Gandii Baat]]'', which marked her entry into the [[Indian film industry]].<ref>{{Cite web |last=Service |first=Express News |date=2024-09-11 |title=‚ÄòI see myself thriving in the South Indian industry‚Äô, singer Anveshi Jain |url=https://www.newindianexpress.com/amp/story/entertainment/kannada/2024/Sep/25/i-see-myself-thriving-in-the-south-indian-industry-singer-anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=The New Indian Express |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain recalls taking inspiration from Money Heist's Tokyo for Martin, almost losing her life on set {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-anveshi-jain-taking-inspiration-from-money-heist-tokyo-for-martin-almost-losing-her-life-on-set-exclusive-3101984/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com}}</ref><ref name=":5">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref>
'''Anveshi Jain''' (born 25 June 1996)<ref>{{Cite web |title=Instagram |url=https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pIefxoJ9K/?igsh=MWc2YnQ1aWJqZnFvdA== |access-date=2024-10-01 |website=www.instagram.com}}</ref> is an Indian [[actress]], [[social media influencer]], [[Singing|singer]], and TEDx speaker. She gained recognition after her debut web series in 2019, ''[[Gandii Baat]]'', which marked her entry into the [[Indian film industry]].<ref>{{Cite web |last=Service |first=Express News |date=2024-09-11 |title=‚ÄòI see myself thriving in the South Indian industry‚Äô, singer Anveshi Jain |url=https://www.newindianexpress.com/amp/story/entertainment/kannada/2024/Sep/25/i-see-myself-thriving-in-the-south-indian-industry-singer-anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=The New Indian Express |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain recalls taking inspiration from Money Heist's Tokyo for Martin, almost losing her life on set {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-anveshi-jain-taking-inspiration-from-money-heist-tokyo-for-martin-almost-losing-her-life-on-set-exclusive-3101984/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com}}</ref><ref name=":5">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref>


== Early life ==
== Early and personal life ==
Anveshi was born to a Jain family in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in Indore.<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]].<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref>
Anveshi was born to a Jain family in [[Khajuraho]], Madhya Pradesh.<ref>{{Cite web |title=The twists and turns in the life of Anveshi Jain- The Week |url=https://www.theweek.in/theweek/leisure/2024/09/21/the-twists-and-turns-in-the-life-of-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-woman-in-india.amp.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.theweek.in}}</ref> She studied [[Electronic engineering|electronics engineering]] at [[Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidyalaya]] and later pursued an [[Master of Business Administration|MBA]] in Indore.<ref name=":6">{{Cite web |last=MS |first=Malavika |title=Who is Anveshi Jain? Here Are 9 Things To Know About Her |url=https://www.shethepeople.tv/shestars/who-is-anveshi-jain/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.shethepeople.tv |language=en}}</ref> She discontinued her MBA course before moving to [[Mumbai]].<ref name=":6" /><ref name=":3">{{Cite web |title=Meet engineer-turned-actress, who left her business for films, one adult show made her star; now set to feature in... |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/photo-gallery-meet-engineer-turned-actress-left-business-for-films-one-adult-show-star-set-to-feature-martin-anveshi-jain-3102349/anveshi-jain-struggle-3102352 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com |language=en}}</ref> Prior to getting work in [[Gandhi Baat]] she worked as a singer and emcee as well. She gave several auditions in order to get a break in the film industry.

In 2022, she mentioned that she hit puberty much earlier than the usual age and her breast size increased significantly. As a result, when she was 14 years of age, her father placed a lot of restrictions on her and she had to wear an extra layer of clothing to cover up her cleavage. As a result she often had to face objectifying comments and looks.

She often mentions that whenever someone asks her where she hails from and replies that she's from Khajuraho, people often correlate her adult content to her hometown which is known for [[Khajuraho temples | temples depicting sexuality]] and giving her a surprised look.

===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a man's wife who's [[bisexual]] and that was her sole appearance in that web series. The second season was released in March 2019. The intimate scenes between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a man's wife who's [[bisexual]] and that was her sole appearance in that web series. The second season was released in January 2019. The intimate scenes between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? '''Anveshi Jain''' (born 25 June 1996)<ref>{{Cite web |title=Instagram |url=https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pIefxoJ9K/?igsh=MWc2YnQ1aWJqZnFvdA== |access-date=2024-10-01 |website=www.instagram.com}}</ref> is an Indian [[actress]], [[social media influencer]], [[Singing|singer]], and TEDx speaker. She gained recognition after her debut web series in 2018, ''[[Gandii Baat]]'', which marked her entry into the [[Indian film industry]].<ref>{{Cite web |last=Service |first=Express News |date=2024-09-11 |title=‚ÄòI see myself thriving in the South Indian industry‚Äô, singer Anveshi Jain |url=https://www.newindianexpress.com/amp/story/entertainment/kannada/2024/Sep/25/i-see-myself-thriving-in-the-south-indian-industry-singer-anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=The New Indian Express |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain recalls taking inspiration from Money Heist's Tokyo for Martin, almost losing her life on set {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-anveshi-jain-taking-inspiration-from-money-heist-tokyo-for-martin-almost-losing-her-life-on-set-exclusive-3101984/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com}}</ref><ref name=":5">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref>
'''Anveshi Jain''' (born 25 June 1996)<ref>{{Cite web |title=Instagram |url=https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8pIefxoJ9K/?igsh=MWc2YnQ1aWJqZnFvdA== |access-date=2024-10-01 |website=www.instagram.com}}</ref> is an Indian [[actress]], [[social media influencer]], [[Singing|singer]], and TEDx speaker. She gained recognition after her debut web series in 2019, ''[[Gandii Baat]]'', which marked her entry into the [[Indian film industry]].<ref>{{Cite web |last=Service |first=Express News |date=2024-09-11 |title=‚ÄòI see myself thriving in the South Indian industry‚Äô, singer Anveshi Jain |url=https://www.newindianexpress.com/amp/story/entertainment/kannada/2024/Sep/25/i-see-myself-thriving-in-the-south-indian-industry-singer-anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=The New Indian Express |language=en}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain recalls taking inspiration from Money Heist's Tokyo for Martin, almost losing her life on set {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.dnaindia.com/entertainment/report-anveshi-jain-taking-inspiration-from-money-heist-tokyo-for-martin-almost-losing-her-life-on-set-exclusive-3101984/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.dnaindia.com}}</ref><ref name=":5">{{Cite web |date=2024-08-29 |title=All About Anveshi Jain, Once The Most Googled Actress |url=https://www.news18.com/amp/movies/all-about-anveshi-jain-once-the-most-googled-actress-9032120.html |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=News18 |language=en}}</ref>
