===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. She acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a man's wife who's [[bisexual]] and that was her only appearance in that web series. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>
In 2019, she got her first show named [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which showcased sexuality among people in rural India. Prior to getting the role, she was told to reduce weight. In order to bag the role, she went on a strict diet which was coupled with rigourous exercise for 90 days. She got the role and she acted in the first episode in the second season of the show where she plays a man's wife who's [[bisexual]] and that was her sole appearance in that web series. The second season was released in March 2019. The intimate scenes between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? ===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]]. She acted in only one episode in the second season of the show where she plays a character's wife who's [[bisexual]]. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? ===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]]. She acted in only one episode in the second season of the show where she plays a character's wife who's [[bisexual]]. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]]. She acted in only one episode in the second season of the show where she plays a character's wife who's [[bisexual]]. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice (magazine)| Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.<ref>{{Cite web |date=2022-06-16 |title=My Journey From Being a Small-Town Girl to One of India‚Äôs Top Erotica Stars |url=https://www.vice.com/en/article/anveshi-jain-india-erotica-star-web-series-sex/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=VICE |language=en-US}}</ref>


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>

===As an Actress ===
===As an Actress ===
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]] which gained her overnight success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>
In 2018, she got her first show [[Gandii Baat|Gandi Baat]]. She acted in only one episode in the second season of the show where she plays a character's wife who's [[bisexual]]. The intimate lovemaking scene between her and her co-star [[Flora Saini]] in that episode led to Anveshi become an overnight sensation and she garnered a lot of success.<ref name=":5" /> Her [[Instagram]] following experienced a significant increase.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Alt balaji irotic series fame anveshi jain gets 71 followers in just 24 hours actress reacts it unbelievable {{!}} ‡§Ö‡§≤‡•ç‡§ü ‡§¨‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§ú‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ú ‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§π‡§∏‡•Ä‡§®‡§æ ‡§ï‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• 24 ‡§ò‡§Ç‡§ü‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡•Å‡§Ü ‡§ï‡•Å‡§õ ‡§ê‡§∏‡§æ ‡§ï‡§ø... ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•Ä ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§á‡§§‡§®‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à ‡§â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§∞ {{!}} Hindi News, ‡§¨‡•â‡§≤‡•Ä‡§µ‡•Å‡§° |url=https://zeenews.india.com/hindi/entertainment/bollywood/alt-balaji-erotic-series-fame-anveshi-jain-gets-71-followers-in-just-24-hours-actress-reacts-it-unbelievable/1131195/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=zeenews.india.com}}</ref>After that, she became one of the most-Googled celebrities in 2019. In 2022, she revealed in an interview with [[Vice]] that this series was her last attempt to get inside the film industry and she did not know that she would get a lot of fame.


In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>
In June 2019, Anveshi launched an official app,<ref>{{Cite web |date=2019-08-18 |title="Value your time as money" - Interview with the glamorous Anveshi Jain : Retro Kolkata Exclusive |url=https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |access-date=2024-01-19 |website=Retro Kolkata |language=en |archive-date=2023-09-30 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230930221903/https://www.retrokolkata.net/anveshi-jain |url-status=live }}</ref> through which she interacts with her fans through live sessions, shares unseen pictures, music videos, dating vlogs, and new shows.<ref name=":4" /> The app was inspired by a fan-created application that initially gained 40 thousand downloads in a single day.<ref name=":4">{{Cite web |date=25 June 2019 |title=Anveshi Jain launches a new song and official mobile app on her birthday |url=https://www.apnnews.com/anveshi-jain-launches-a-new-song-and-official-mobile-app-on-her-birthday/}}</ref> She made special appearances on ''[[BOSS: Baap of Special Services]]'' and [[Who's Your Daddy? (2020 TV series)|''Who's Your Daddy?'']].<ref name=":6" /> In 2020 she appeared in Lakshmikanth Chenna's Commitment, marking her [[Telugu cinema|Telugu]] debut.<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=2020-03-27 |title=Anveshi Jain to play sexologist in Telugu debut movie - www.lokmattimes.com |url=https://www.lokmattimes.com/maharashtra/anveshi-jain-to-play-sexologist-in-telugu-debut-movie/ |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Lokmat Times |language=en}}</ref> In the same year, she made her debut in [[Gujarati cinema|Dhollywood]] with playing lead role in the film G.<ref>{{Cite news |title='G' trailer: Chirag Jani takes on an impressive fight against illegal alcohol trade |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/gujarati/movies/news/g-trailer-chirag-jani-takes-on-an-impressive-fight-against-illegal-alcohol-trade/amp_articleshow/72290820.cms |access-date=2024-09-30 |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257}}</ref> In 2022, Anveshi did a song in [[Ravi Teja]]‚Äôs film [[Ramarao on Duty]] called ‚ÄúSeesa‚Äú sung by [[Shreya Ghoshal]].<ref>{{Cite web |title=Item song from Ramarao on Duty comes out {{!}} Telugu Cinema |url=https://telugucinema.com/news/item-song-from-ramarao-on-duty-comes-out?amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=telugucinema.com |language=en-US}}</ref> She also appeared in the web series Tera Chhalaava in the same year.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Anveshi Jain and Manish Goplani on their web series Tera Chhalaava, theme & more {{!}} Exclusive |url=https://www.zoomtventertainment.com/videos/tv-news/anveshi-jain-and-manish-goplani-on-their-web-series-tera-chhalaava-theme-more-exclusive-video-92754070/amp |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=Zoom TV |language=en}}</ref>

In 2021, Jain ventured into music with the release of "Jugnu" on SpotlampE.<ref>{{Cite web |title=SpotlampE Song ‚ÄòJugnu‚Äô OUT: Anveshi Jain's Melodious Track Is Filled With Hope And Inspiration |url=https://www.spotboye.com/amp/music/music-news/spotlampe-song-jugnu-out-anveshi-jain-s-melodious-track-is-filled-with-hope-and-inspiration/6130eec6e002610f016787b7 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.spotboye.com}}</ref>
In 2021, Jain ventured into music with the release of "Jugnu" on SpotlampE.<ref>{{Cite web |title=SpotlampE Song ‚ÄòJugnu‚Äô OUT: Anveshi Jain's Melodious Track Is Filled With Hope And Inspiration |url=https://www.spotboye.com/amp/music/music-news/spotlampe-song-jugnu-out-anveshi-jain-s-melodious-track-is-filled-with-hope-and-inspiration/6130eec6e002610f016787b7 |access-date=2024-09-30 |website=www.spotboye.com}}</ref>

| ''[[The Painted House]]''
| ''[[The Painted House]]''
| The CBFC denied a rating to film for containing nudity. They suggested the scenes should be blurred or deleted.<ref name="DepictingNudity-TOI">{{Cite news |url=http://epaperbeta.timesofindia.com/Article.aspx?eid=31811&articlexml=Film-denied-certificate-for-depicting-nudity-25082015004061 |title=Film denied certificate for depicting nudity |date=25 August 2015 |work=[[The Times of India]] |access-date=8 April 2016 |url-status=dead |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151006162408/http://epaperbeta.timesofindia.com/Article.aspx?eid=31811&articlexml=Film-denied-certificate-for-depicting-nudity-25082015004061 |archive-date=6 October 2015}}</ref>
| The CBFC denied a rating to film for containing severe nudity. There were three scenes where the breasts and the buttocks of the female lead were fully visible while being nude. They suggested that those three scenes should be blurred or deleted. The filmmakers remained firm on their decision of not doing so and the film was banned. However the filmmakers challenged this decision in the High Court where they eventually won the case. The court then reversed the ban and gave clearance to the film and it was released without any cuts with an 'A' certificate.<ref name="DepictingNudity-TOI">{{Cite news |url=http://epaperbeta.timesofindia.com/Article.aspx?eid=31811&articlexml=Film-denied-certificate-for-depicting-nudity-25082015004061 |title=Film denied certificate for depicting nudity |date=25 August 2015 |work=[[The Times of India]] |access-date=8 April 2016 |url-status=dead |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151006162408/http://epaperbeta.timesofindia.com/Article.aspx?eid=31811&articlexml=Film-denied-certificate-for-depicting-nudity-25082015004061 |archive-date=6 October 2015}}</ref>

|first=S.R.|url=http://www.thehindu.com/news/cities/Thiruvananthapuram/directors-out-against-cbfc-directives/article7598643.ece|title=Directors out against CBFC directives|date=31 August 2015|newspaper=[[The Hindu]]|accessdate=30 November 2016}}</ref><ref>{{cite news|first=Ashwini|last=Ghosalkar|title=4th Jio Filmfare Awards Marathi 2018: Neha Mahajan has two Bollywood projects in her kitty!|url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/4th-jio-filmfare-awards-marathi-2018-neha-mahajan-has-two-bollywood-projects-in-her-kitty/articleshow/65983290.cms |work=The Times of India |date=27 September 2018 |accessdate=2019-02-14 }}</ref> Mahajan made her debut in 2012, with the [[English-language]] Canadian-British production ''[[Midnight's Children (film)|Midnight's Children]]'' directed by [[Deepa Mehta]].


In 2013, Mahajan played Ophelia in [[Madhav Vaze]]'s stage production of ''[[Hamlet]]'' in Marathi.<ref>{{cite news |first=Akshata|last=Shetty |title=Theatre director Madhav Vaze directs Shakespeare's Hamlet in Marathi |url=http://epaper.timesofindia.com/Repository/ml.asp?Ref=VE9JUFUvMjAxMy8wMi8yOCNBcjAyNzAy |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150402134246/http://epaper.timesofindia.com/Repository/ml.asp?Ref=VE9JUFUvMjAxMy8wMi8yOCNBcjAyNzAy |url-status=dead |archive-date=2 April 2015 |work=Times of India |date=28 February 2013 |accessdate=2015-03-05 }}</ref> She then appeared in ''[[Ajoba]]'' (2013), and ''Feast of Varanasi'' (2014).<ref>{{cite news |title=Supreme Motion Pictures launched at a star-studded event |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/Supreme-Motion-Pictures-launched-at-a-star-studded-event/articleshow/21300282.cms |work=Times of India |date=24 July 2013 |accessdate=2015-03-05 }}</ref> In 2015, she made her [[Malayalam cinema|Mollywood]] debut as Vishaya in the indie drama ''[[The Painted House]]''.<ref>{{cite news |first=Arathi|last=Kannan|title='Chaayam Poosiya Veedu': Angels and demons...|url=https://english.manoramaonline.com/in-depth/iffk-2015/movie-review/chaayam-poosiya-veedu-iffk-2015-competition-film-review.html |work=Manorama Online... |date=7 December 2015 |accessdate=2019-02-14 }}</ref> Most recently Neha appeared in the 2019 [[Netflix]] series ''[[Leila (TV series)|Leila]]'', a dystopian drama. She was also seen in Rohit Shetty's action film ''[[Simmba]]''.{{Citation needed|date=June 2022}} In 2020, she made her Hollywood debut in the action-thriller ''[[Extraction (2020 film)|Extraction]]''.
In 2013, Mahajan played Ophelia in [[Madhav Vaze]]'s stage production of ''[[Hamlet]]'' in Marathi.<ref>{{cite news |first=Akshata|last=Shetty |title=Theatre director Madhav Vaze directs Shakespeare's Hamlet in Marathi |url=http://epaper.timesofindia.com/Repository/ml.asp?Ref=VE9JUFUvMjAxMy8wMi8yOCNBcjAyNzAy |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150402134246/http://epaper.timesofindia.com/Repository/ml.asp?Ref=VE9JUFUvMjAxMy8wMi8yOCNBcjAyNzAy |url-status=dead |archive-date=2 April 2015 |work=Times of India |date=28 February 2013 |accessdate=2015-03-05 }}</ref> She then appeared in ''[[Ajoba]]'' (2013), and ''Feast of Varanasi'' (2014).<ref>{{cite news |title=Supreme Motion Pictures launched at a star-studded event |url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/Supreme-Motion-Pictures-launched-at-a-star-studded-event/articleshow/21300282.cms |work=Times of India |date=24 July 2013 |accessdate=2015-03-05 }}</ref> In 2015, she made her [[Malayalam cinema|Mollywood]] debut as Vishaya in the indie drama ''[[The Painted House]]'' which was marred with controversy during its release as it was initially banned in India by the censor board as the film-makers did not agree to delete the scenes which depicted the female lead completely nude. However the film-makers challenged the decision in High Court where the film was given clearance and released without any cuts with an "A" certificate. <ref>{{cite news |first=Arathi|last=Kannan|title='Chaayam Poosiya Veedu': Angels and demons...|url=https://english.manoramaonline.com/in-depth/iffk-2015/movie-review/chaayam-poosiya-veedu-iffk-2015-competition-film-review.html |work=Manorama Online... |date=7 December 2015 |accessdate=2019-02-14 }}</ref> Most recently Neha appeared in the 2019 [[Netflix]] series ''[[Leila (TV series)|Leila]]'', a dystopian drama. She was also seen in Rohit Shetty's action film ''[[Simmba]]''.{{Citation needed|date=June 2022}} In 2020, she made her Hollywood debut in the action-thriller ''[[Extraction (2020 film)|Extraction]]''.


==Early life==
==Early life==

The Painted House

diff

2024-12-04T11:03:32Z
Line 18: Line 18:
}}
}}


'''''The Painted House''''' ([[Malayalam]] title: '''''Chaayam Pooshiya Veedu''''') is a 2015 Indian [[Malayalam]]-language [[Independent film|independent]] [[drama film]] directed by brothers Santosh and Satish Babusenan in their feature debut. The film stars [[Neha Mahajan]], Kaladharan Nair, and Akram Mohammed. The film was mainly made in Malayalam and English, but it has official dubbed versions in Hindi and Tamil as ''Rangeen Ghar'' and ''Vaanam Poosiya Veedu'' respectively.
'''''The Painted House''''' ([[Malayalam]] title: '''''Chaayam Pooshiya Veedu''''') is a 2015 Indian [[Malayalam]]-language [[Independent film|independent]] [[drama film]] directed by brothers Santosh and Satish Babusenan in their feature debut. The film stars [[Neha Mahajan]] (in her Mollywood debut), Kaladharan Nair, and Akram Mohammed. The film was mainly made in Malayalam and English, but it has official dubbed versions in Hindi and Tamil as ''Rangeen Ghar'' and ''Vaanam Poosiya Veedu'' respectively. The film was surrounded with controversy during its release as it was initially banned in India by the censor board due to filmmakers not agreeing to delete the scenes which depict the female lead fully nude. The filmmakers eventually challenged the ban in High Court where the it was overturned and the film was given clearance with an A certificate without any cuts


The Babusenan brothers were formerly cinematographers and producers in Mumbai, working for MTV, Channel V, STAR and others. In 1998 they made a short film, Twilight Dream, which was selected to the Split Film Festival in Croatia and the Mumbai International Film Festival. The Painted House was made after a gap of seventeen years.
The Babusenan brothers were formerly cinematographers and producers in Mumbai, working for MTV, Channel V, STAR and others. In 1998 they made a short film, Twilight Dream, which was selected to the Split Film Festival in Croatia and the Mumbai International Film Festival. The Painted House was made after a gap of seventeen years.

2024-11-17T07:42:26Z
Line 30: Line 30:


[[File:Information.svg|25px|alt=Information icon]] Hello, I'm [[User:Geniac|Geniac]]. I noticed that you made an edit concerning content related to a living (or recently deceased) person{{spaces|1}}on [[:Shruti Marathe]], but you didn't support your changes with a [[Help:Referencing for beginners|citation to a reliable source]]. It's been removed and archived in the page history for now. Wikipedia has a very strict policy concerning [[Wikipedia:Biographies of living persons|how we write about living people]], so please help us keep such articles accurate and clear. If you think I made a mistake, or if you have any questions, you can leave me a message on [[User_talk:Geniac|my talk page]]. Thank you! <!-- Template:uw-biog1 --> [[User:Geniac|Geniac]] ([[User talk:Geniac|talk]]) 04:57, 17 November 2024 (UTC)
[[File:Information.svg|25px|alt=Information icon]] Hello, I'm [[User:Geniac|Geniac]]. I noticed that you made an edit concerning content related to a living (or recently deceased) person{{spaces|1}}on [[:Shruti Marathe]], but you didn't support your changes with a [[Help:Referencing for beginners|citation to a reliable source]]. It's been removed and archived in the page history for now. Wikipedia has a very strict policy concerning [[Wikipedia:Biographies of living persons|how we write about living people]], so please help us keep such articles accurate and clear. If you think I made a mistake, or if you have any questions, you can leave me a message on [[User_talk:Geniac|my talk page]]. Thank you! <!-- Template:uw-biog1 --> [[User:Geniac|Geniac]] ([[User talk:Geniac|talk]]) 04:57, 17 November 2024 (UTC)

Shruti Marathe

diff

2024-11-17T04:07:54Z
Line 33: Line 33:
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>


She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and a year later she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut. Koratala Siva later explained that he chose her because he didn‚Äôt want an actress to look like a second heroine in the film. He further added that he was searching for an actress who complemented Devara‚Äôs personality. He then clarified that if he had casted any reputed actor then perhaps their image would have sidelined the role. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/telugu/koratala-siva-reveals-why-he-chose-marathi-actress-shruti-marathe-as-elder-ntrs-wife-in-devara-article-113692195 | title=Koratala Siva reveals why he chose Marathi actress Shruti Marathe as elder NTR's wife in Devara | website=Times Now}}</ref>
She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and a year later she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut. Koratala Siva later explained that he chose her because he didn‚Äôt want an actress to look like a second heroine in the film. He further added that he had been searching for an actress who complemented Devara‚Äôs personality. He then clarified that if he had casted any reputed actor then perhaps their image would have sidelined the role. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/telugu/koratala-siva-reveals-why-he-chose-marathi-actress-shruti-marathe-as-elder-ntrs-wife-in-devara-article-113692195 | title=Koratala Siva reveals why he chose Marathi actress Shruti Marathe as elder NTR's wife in Devara | website=Times Now}}</ref>

The technical crew consist of musician [[Anirudh Ravichander]], cinematographer [[R. Rathnavelu]], editor [[A. Singh]] also joined the cast after filming few prelimnary sequences.<ref>{{Cite web |last=Sistu |first=Suhas |date=8 June 2023 |title="Devara" sets filled with actors from multiple industries December 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231227173658/https://www.thehansindia.com/cinema/tollywood/devara-sets-filled-with-actors-from-multiple-industries-801556 |url-status=live}}</ref> In February 2024, reports surfaced stating that [[Shruti Marathe]], a [[Marathi people|Marathi]] actress, had been chosen to star alongside Jr NTR.<ref>{{Cite news |date=10 February 2024 |title=Popular Marathi actress Shruti Marathe to star opposite Jr NTR in Devara: Report |work=The Times of India |issn=0971-8257 |archive-date=22 March 2024 |url-status=live }}</ref> Shruti confirmed this during an interview with the Marathi Star Media portal.<ref name=":0" /> Siva later revealed that he chose Shruti as Devara's wife as he didn‚Äôt want an actress to look like a second heroine in the film. He further added that he was searching for an actress who complements Devara‚Äôs personality and he clarified that had he cast any reputed actor perhaps their image would have sidelined the role. <ref>{{Cite web | url=https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/telugu/koratala-siva-reveals-why-he-chose-marathi-actress-shruti-marathe-as-elder-ntrs-wife-in-devara-article-113692195 | title= Koratala Siva Reveals Why He Chose Marathi Actress Shruti Marathe As Elder NTR‚Äôs Wife In Devara | website=Times Now}}</ref>
[[Prakash Raj]] and [[Meera Jasmine]] participated at the launch ceremony, thereby being part of the film.<ref>{{Cite web |title=NTR 30 officially launched |url=https://www.cinemaexpress.com/telugu/news/2023/mar/23/ntr-30-officially-launched-41427.html |access-date=27 December 2023 |website=[[Cinema Express]] |date=23 March 2023 |language=en === Filming ===
=== Filming ===

Shruti Marathe

diff

2024-11-17T04:05:07Z
Line 33: Line 33:
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>


She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and a year later she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut. Koratala Siva later explained that he chose her because he he doesn‚Äôt want an actress to look like a second heroine in the film. He further added that he was searching for an actress who complements Devara‚Äôs personality. He then clarified that had he cast any reputed actor perhaps their image would have sidelined the role. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/telugu/koratala-siva-reveals-why-he-chose-marathi-actress-shruti-marathe-as-elder-ntrs-wife-in-devara-article-113692195 | title=Koratala Siva reveals why he chose Marathi actress Shruti Marathe as elder NTR's wife in Devara | website=Times Now}}</ref>
She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and a year later she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut. Koratala Siva later explained that he chose her because he didn‚Äôt want an actress to look like a second heroine in the film. He further added that he was searching for an actress who complemented Devara‚Äôs personality. He then clarified that if he had casted any reputed actor then perhaps their image would have sidelined the role. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/telugu/koratala-siva-reveals-why-he-chose-marathi-actress-shruti-marathe-as-elder-ntrs-wife-in-devara-article-113692195 | title=Koratala Siva reveals why he chose Marathi actress Shruti Marathe as elder NTR's wife in Devara | website=Times Now}}</ref>

[[Prakash Raj]] and [[Meera Jasmine]] participated at the launch ceremony, thereby being part of the film.<ref>{{Cite web |title=NTR 30 officially launched === Filming ===
=== Filming ===

Shruti Marathe

diff

2024-11-17T03:56:26Z
Line 33: Line 33:
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>


She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.
She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and a year later she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut. Koratala Siva later explained that he chose her because he he doesn‚Äôt want an actress to look like a second heroine in the film. He further added that he was searching for an actress who complements Devara‚Äôs personality. He then clarified that had he cast any reputed actor perhaps their image would have sidelined the role. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://www.timesnownews.com/entertainment-news/telugu/koratala-siva-reveals-why-he-chose-marathi-actress-shruti-marathe-as-elder-ntrs-wife-in-devara-article-113692195 | title=Koratala Siva reveals why he chose Marathi actress Shruti Marathe as elder NTR's wife in Devara | website=Times Now}}</ref>

In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>


She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) in Pune. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.
She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) named Kalavanta Dhol Tasha Pathak in Pune since 10 years. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.

==Production==
==Production==
The actor [[Raghuvaran]] had been signed up and completed a photo shoot for the film. He died during the production of the movie and was replaced by Nassar.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil-movie-news-1/may-08-04/kanthaswamy-31-05-08.html |title=Kanthaswamy latest replacement - Behindwoods.com Vikram Shriya Kanthaswamy director Susi Ganesan music director Devi Sri Prasad Tamil Movies Latest News Bollywood News Kollywoods Latest News picture image gallery stills wallpapers |website=Behindwoods.com |date= |accessdate=2022-08-09}}</ref> Actress Malavika nee Swetha Kunnur Menon was roped in as the female lead and she backed out citing her wedding and harassment on the sets. She was then replaced by Shruthi.
The actor [[Raghuvaran]] had been signed up and completed a photo shoot for the film. He died during the production of the movie and was replaced by Nassar.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil-movie-news-1/may-08-04/kanthaswamy-31-05-08.html |title=Kanthaswamy latest replacement - Behindwoods.com Vikram Shriya Kanthaswamy director Susi Ganesan music director Devi Sri Prasad Tamil Movies Latest News Bollywood News Kollywoods Latest News picture image gallery stills wallpapers |website=Behindwoods.com |date= |accessdate=2022-08-09}}</ref> Actress Malavika nee Swetha Kunnur Menon was roped in as the female lead and she backed out citing her wedding and harassment on the sets. She was then replaced by Shruti Marathe. She was casted on the recommendation of a photographer in Pune.


==Soundtrack==
==Soundtrack==

Shruti Marathe

diff

2024-11-16T12:11:47Z
Line 31: Line 31:
Shruti married actor Gaurav Ghatnekar in 2016.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Shruti Marathe and Gaurav Ghatnekar celebrate their second wedding anniversary |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/marathi/shruti-marathe-and-gaurav-ghatnekar-celebrate-their-second-wedding-anniversary/articleshow/66934155.cms |access-date=28 May 2021 |website=The Times of India |language=en}}</ref> She sometimes goes by the name Shruti Prakash or Hema Malini while acting in South Indian films.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/did-you-know/Shruti-has-two-different-screen-names/articleshow/45822742.cms |title=Shruti has two different screen names |website=The Times of India}}</ref> In 2012, she decided to take a break from acting in Tamil films and decided to act full-time in Marathi industry as she found it difficult to act in those films due to lack of fluency in Tamil language and Marathi being her mother tongue. She had hired a tutor to teach her Tamil not for learning for scenes' dialogues but to interact with people and staff on sets.
Shruti married actor Gaurav Ghatnekar in 2016.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Shruti Marathe and Gaurav Ghatnekar celebrate their second wedding anniversary |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/marathi/shruti-marathe-and-gaurav-ghatnekar-celebrate-their-second-wedding-anniversary/articleshow/66934155.cms |access-date=28 May 2021 |website=The Times of India |language=en}}</ref> She sometimes goes by the name Shruti Prakash or Hema Malini while acting in South Indian films.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/did-you-know/Shruti-has-two-different-screen-names/articleshow/45822742.cms |title=Shruti has two different screen names |website=The Times of India}}</ref> In 2012, she decided to take a break from acting in Tamil films and decided to act full-time in Marathi industry as she found it difficult to act in those films due to lack of fluency in Tamil language and Marathi being her mother tongue. She had hired a tutor to teach her Tamil not for learning for scenes' dialogues but to interact with people and staff on sets.


In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified in that scene. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified on social media. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>


She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) in Pune. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.
She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) in Pune. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.

Shruti Marathe

2024-11-16T12:10:47Z
Line 31: Line 31:
Shruti married actor Gaurav Ghatnekar in 2016.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Shruti Marathe and Gaurav Ghatnekar celebrate their second wedding anniversary |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/marathi/shruti-marathe-and-gaurav-ghatnekar-celebrate-their-second-wedding-anniversary/articleshow/66934155.cms |access-date=28 May 2021 |website=The Times of India |language=en}}</ref> She sometimes goes by the name Shruti Prakash or Hema Malini while acting in South Indian films.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/did-you-know/Shruti-has-two-different-screen-names/articleshow/45822742.cms |title=Shruti has two different screen names |website=The Times of India}}</ref> In 2012, she decided to take a break from acting in Tamil films and decided to act full-time in Marathi industry as she found it difficult to act in those films due to lack of fluency in Tamil language and Marathi being her mother tongue. She had hired a tutor to teach her Tamil not for learning for scenes' dialogues but to interact with people and staff on sets.
Shruti married actor Gaurav Ghatnekar in 2016.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Shruti Marathe and Gaurav Ghatnekar celebrate their second wedding anniversary |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/marathi/shruti-marathe-and-gaurav-ghatnekar-celebrate-their-second-wedding-anniversary/articleshow/66934155.cms |access-date=28 May 2021 |website=The Times of India |language=en}}</ref> She sometimes goes by the name Shruti Prakash or Hema Malini while acting in South Indian films.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/did-you-know/Shruti-has-two-different-screen-names/articleshow/45822742.cms |title=Shruti has two different screen names |website=The Times of India}}</ref> In 2012, she decided to take a break from acting in Tamil films and decided to act full-time in Marathi industry as she found it difficult to act in those films due to lack of fluency in Tamil language and Marathi being her mother tongue. She had hired a tutor to teach her Tamil not for learning for scenes' dialogues but to interact with people and staff on sets.


In one of the interviews in 2023, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a onesie swimsuit for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that onsie swimsuit scene in that song. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a onesie swimsuit had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a onesie swimsuit in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and was even body shamed for her weight in the beginning but later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>
In 2019, Shruti revealed that she was trolled on social media when she just entered the Marathi film industry but this trolling turned into appreciation. While shooting for the Tamil film ''[[Guru Sishyan (2010 film)| Guru Sishyan ]]'' in 2010, she had worn a bikini for the song "Kathara Kathara" in that film. The film had received negative reviews and did poorly but was mainly remembered for that bikini scene in that song. She mentioned that she was asked to wear one and she readily agreed and said that she hadn‚Äôt even considered questions like how was it going to be shot or whether it was required or not, as all that mattered to her was the opportunity to be part of that film. The fact that she had worked in a Tamil film and worn a bikini had gone under the radar as according to her back then South Indian films didn't make much news outside of those states as compared to today where accesibility to news about South Indian films is easy thanks to social media, OTT platforms and theaters. However when she did her first Marathi daily soap ''[[Radha Hi Bawari]]'' in 2012 and gained fame in many households, many people out of curiosity started searching about her on the Internet with the first photo showing up of her in a bikini in a pool from one of those still photos of that film. Right after the first episode of the serial, she was heavily trolled on social media for those photos and the scene especially for the way it was shot. She was even bodyshamed for her weight in the beginning but she kept working as if that incident didn't bother her even though she was objectified in that scene. Later on as the serial went on, she began to receive appreciation and love for her acting. <ref>{{Cite web| url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/marathi/movies/news/shruti-marathe-shares-her-metoo-story-in-a-shocking-incident/articleshow/68750737.cms | title=Shruti shares about her MeToo story in a shocking incident | website=The Times of India}}</ref>


She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) in Pune. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.
She is also a member of a Nashik Dhol pathak (squad) in Pune. Every Ganpati festival, she goes there to participate in the visarjan (immersion) procession religiously. Her photos of her playing the dhol had become famous in 2022 and in 2023 she revealed that due to those photos she bagged a role in the 2024 Telugu-language film ''[[Devara: Part 1]]'' thus making her Tollywood debut.
